terms.definition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Aches and pains.

terms.definition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Is your mood variation attributed to the environment?
